short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds a button to copy coordinates from a record conveniently

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: For users of the ADU Virtual Museum, it can be cumbersome to copy coordinates for a particular observation to be able to plot them in Google Maps, a GIS, or to store them for your own purposes. This tool makes it easy.
